A

C

com.actinarium.rhythm.control - package com.actinarium.rhythm.control
 

D

decorate(View...) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup
A handy method that will decorate provided views with RhythmDrawables controlled by this group.
decorateForeground(FrameLayout...) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup
Similar to RhythmGroup.decorate(View...), but decorates foregrounds instead of backgrounds of provided views (available only for FrameLayout), therefore drawing the overlay over the view’s content.

M

makeDrawable() - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup
Make a new RhythmDrawable that will draw the group’s active RhythmOverlay and can be used as any other Drawable in Android SDK.
makeGroup(String) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmControl
Make a new Rhythm group, registered in this Rhythm control
mBounds - Variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Overlay bounds, relative to this view (since canvas is already translated to the origin point of this view)
mOverlayPosition - Variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
mRhythmDrawable - Variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Obtained from RhythmGroup, which then controls this drawable, telling it what RhythmOverlay to draw.
mRhythmGroupIndex - Variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Index of the group this view should get its RhythmDrawable from, or RhythmFrameLayout.NO_GROUP.

N

NO_GROUP - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Use this value to indicate that this view is not connected to any RhythmGroup and shouldn’t display any overlay
NO_OVERLAY - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup

onDraw(Canvas) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
onHandleIntent(Intent) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmNotificationService
 
onLayout(boolean, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
OVERLAY_POSITION_OVER_CONTENT - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Draw the overlay over the view’s content (sans foreground).
OVERLAY_POSITION_OVER_FOREGROUND - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Same as RhythmFrameLayout.OVERLAY_POSITION_OVER_CONTENT, but this also draws over any foreground (ripples, touch highlights etc).
OVERLAY_POSITION_UNDER_BACKGROUND - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Draw the overlay under the background of this view.
OVERLAY_POSITION_UNDER_CONTENT - Static variable in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Draw the overlay over view’s background but under child views.

R

RhythmControl - Class in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
A controller that interconnects RhythmGroups, RhythmFrameLayouts, and the Quick Control notification, and should be used as an entry point to accessing Rhythm library programmatically.
RhythmControl(Context) - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmControl
Create a Rhythm control.
RhythmControl.Host - Interface in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
The Application must implement this interface to provide the singleton RhythmControl instance through its method RhythmControl.Host.getRhythmControl() to RhythmFrameLayouts and the Quick Control notification
RhythmFrameLayout - Class in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
A FrameLayout implementation with rich Rhythm support.
RhythmFrameLayout(Context) - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
RhythmFrameLayout(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
RhythmFrameLayout(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
RhythmFrameLayout(Context, AttributeSet, int, int) - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
 
RhythmFrameLayout.OverlayPosition - Annotation Type in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
Type def annotation for overlay position enum
RhythmGroup - Class in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
Controls a group of RhythmDrawables, namely propagates the same RhythmOverlay for all registered RhythmDrawables to render.
RhythmGroup() - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup
Create a new Rhythm group.
RhythmNotificationService - Class in com.actinarium.rhythm.control
An intent service backing Quick Control notification functionality.
RhythmNotificationService() - Constructor for class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmNotificationService

setRhythmDrawable(RhythmDrawable) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout

setRhythmGroupIndex(int) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmFrameLayout
Link this drawable to a different RhythmGroup (identified by index), or to no group at all.
setTitle(String) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmGroup
Set the title for this group.
showQuickControl(int) - Method in class com.actinarium.rhythm.control.RhythmControl
Show the “Quick Control” notification, which allows to switch overlays for all registered Rhythm groups quickly without navigating away from your app.
